## UnprefixedKey type

Returns a string literal type by stripping the specified `TPrefix` from literal `TKey` or `never` if `TKey` is not prefixed by the `TPrefix`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UnprefixedKey<TKey extends Key, TPrefix> = TKey extends PrefixedKey<infer TUnprefixed, TPrefix> ? TUnprefixed : never;
```
**References:** [PrefixedKey](./use-prefixed-props.prefixedkey.md)

## Example


```ts
 type FooBarWithoutFoo = UnprefixedKey<"foo-bar", "foo">
 // "foo"

 type FooBarWithoutBaz = UnprefixedKey<"foo-bar", "baz">
 // never
```
